name: shyle
description: A modern, responsive CSS framework with custom JavaScript components, inspired by Bootstrap.
author: dudushy

scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/ts/shyle.ts src/scss/shyle.scss --dist-dir dist --no-source-maps
scripts.watch: npm run clean && parcel watch src/ts/shyle.ts src/scss/shyle.scss --dist-dir dist --no-source-maps
